name: Cyborgs
description: Cyborg Equipment - All members of the Warband can purchase 1 additional equipment option.
rule: All members of the Warband can purchase 1 additional equipment option.

name: Fanatics
description: Roll Willpower with +1DT for all rolls except Psychic Powers.

name: Living Weapons
description: Unarmed attacks do not have -1DT to Prowess rolls.

name: Heavily Armed
description: Heavily Armed - All Ranged weapons are 1 less Points Cost.
rule: All Ranged weapons are 1 less Points Cost.

name: Mutants
description: Mutant - Speed, Claws & Teeth, Horrible Claws & Teeth, and Whip/Tail cost 1 less Points Cost.
rule: Speed, Claws & Teeth, Horrible Claws & Teeth, and Whip/Tail cost 1 less Points Cost.

name: Soldiers
description: Soldier - Grenades, Heavy Armor, and Medkits may be selected at 0 Points Cost.
rule: Grenades, Heavy Armor, and Medkits may be selected at 0 Points Cost.

name: Undead
description: Undead - A second staggered condition does not take weirdos in this Warband out of action.
